data.title: Management Practices On IBM
data.meta_description: management practices on IBM - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides details about IBM's history and company profile. It discusses how IBM was founded in 1896 as the Tabulating Machine Company and over time merged with other companies to form International Business Machines Corporation. IBM is now a global technology company with over 388,000 employees worldwide and is the largest information technology employer. The document also briefly outlines IBM's achievements in patents, Nobel Prizes earned by employees, and leadership in the semiconductor industry.
